name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium quality wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Organic Cotton T-Shirt
description: Comfortable and sustainable organic cotton t-shirt available in multiple colors. Made from 100% certified organic cotton.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking watch with heart rate monitor, GPS, and smartphone connectivity. Water-resistant design.

name: Artisan Coffee Beans
description: Premium single-origin coffee beans roasted to perfection. Rich, full-bodied flavor with notes of chocolate and caramel.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Professional ergonomic office chair with lumbar support and adjustable height. Designed for all-day comfort.

name: Stainless Steel Water Bottle
description: Insulated stainless steel water bottle that keeps drinks cold for 24 hours or hot for 12 hours. BPA-free and eco-friendly.

name: Wireless Charging Pad
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator.

name: Yoga Mat Premium
description: High-quality non-slip yoga mat made from eco-friendly materials. Perfect for yoga, pilates, and general fitness.

name: Ceramic Plant Pot Set
description: Beautiful set of 3 ceramic plant pots with drainage holes and saucers. Perfect for indoor plants and herbs.

name: Bluetooth Speaker Portable
description: Compact portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound and 12-hour battery life. Waterproof design for outdoor use.

name: Gaming Mechanical Keyboard
description: RGB backlit mechanical gaming keyboard with tactile switches and programmable keys. Perfect for gaming and productivity.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Genuine leather crossbody bag with adjustable strap and multiple compartments. Stylish and functional for everyday use.

name: Essential Oil Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic aromatherapy diffuser with LED lights and timer settings. Creates a relaxing atmosphere with your favorite essential oils.

name: Protein Powder Vanilla
description: High-quality whey protein powder with 25g protein per serving. Vanilla flavor, perfect for post-workout recovery.

name: Bamboo Cutting Board Set
description: Set of 3 bamboo cutting boards in different sizes. Eco-friendly, antimicrobial, and gentle on knife blades.

name: Wireless Gaming Mouse
description: High-precision wireless gaming mouse with customizable DPI settings and ergonomic design. 50-hour battery life.

name: Cashmere Scarf
description: Luxurious 100% cashmere scarf in classic colors. Soft, warm, and perfect for any season. Elegant accessory for any outfit.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: 1080p HD security camera with night vision, motion detection, and smartphone app control. Easy wireless setup.

name: Resistance Bands Set
description: Complete resistance bands set with 5 different resistance levels, door anchor, and exercise guide. Perfect for home workouts.

name: Ceramic Dinnerware Set
description: 16-piece ceramic dinnerware set for 4 people. Microwave and dishwasher safe with modern minimalist design.

name: LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable LED desk lamp with touch controls and USB charging port. Eye-caring light with multiple brightness levels.

name: Gourmet Tea Collection
description: Premium tea collection featuring 12 different flavors from around the world. Perfect gift for tea enthusiasts.

name: Wireless Earbuds Pro
description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and wireless charging case. Crystal clear sound quality.

name: Memory Foam Pillow
description: Ergonomic memory foam pillow with cooling gel layer. Provides optimal neck and head support for better sleep.

name: Stainless Steel Cookware Set
description: Professional 10-piece stainless steel cookware set with tri-ply construction. Induction compatible and dishwasher safe.
